text: Dudley Stuart John Moore CBE (19 April 1935 â€“ 27 March 2002)Guardian obituary was a British actor, comedian and musician. Moore was born in Charing Cross Hospital, London and raised in Dagenham, Essex. He studied at Magdalen College, Oxford. Moore became a pianist and composer. He began a comedy double act with Peter Cook. Moore acted in movies in the United Kingdom and in the United States. He starred in movies including Bedazzled, 10, Arthur and Arthur 2: On the Rocks. Moore died of progressive supranuclear palsy and pneumonia in Plainfield, New Jersey. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1935 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Actors from Essex Category:Comedians from Essex Category:Comedians from London Category:Deaths from progressive supranuclear palsy Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in New Jersey Category:English composers Category:English movie actors Category:English pianists Category:English screenwriters Category:English television actors Category:English television writers Category:Musicians from Essex Category:Musicians from London Category:People from Hammersmith Category:Writers from Essex Category:Writers from London
title: Dudley Moore
